segments.text: Hello , this is Catharine from Thomson Company . Can I speak to Mr . Wang ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry , he is in the middle of something . Can I take a message ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . Please tell him that he is expected to have an interview with the CEO of ABC company tomorrow morning at 10:00 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Could you please speak in a louder voice ? There may be something wrong with your receiver .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , I will repeat what I said loudly .
segments.speaker: S1
